summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2683, for the improvement of McClintock Avenue, from Mt. Baker Circle to Walden Street; and Byron Street, from McClintock Avenue to 33rd Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereof, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31560 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
